debug.canvas.missing_uniform: Unable to find uniform %s in shaders %s, %s. This is normal if the uniform isn't used in the shader.
warn.canvas.slow_gl_call: Unable to obtain a fast call path to %s due to reflection error. Render performance may be reduced.
error.canvas.program_link_failure: Unable to create linked shader due to unexpected error.
error.canvas.max_materials_exceeded: Max shader materials exceeded. Increase max shader materials in Canvas configuration.
config.canvas.title: Canvas Renderer Configuration
config.canvas.help.item_render: Applies material properties;and shaders to items. (WIP)
config.canvas.help.max_materials: Increase if 'Max shader material exceeded';error occurs. Larger values consume a;small amount of memory. Requires restart.
config.canvas.help.shader_debug: Output runtime per-material shader source.;For shader development debugging.
